title: The POODLE attack (SSLv3 supported) at status.slack.com

profile.name: Slack
profile.about: All your team communication in one place, instantly searchable, and available wherever you go.

summaries.content: @cryptographer found that for some regions, status.slack.com supported an outdated cipher suite, which we've since updated. Thanks @cryptographer!

user.name: Luthra
user.bio: Working Hard to become a " Doctor ​🩺 "​
